dialogList.content: Ah, are you asking about locations where you can find our locally-produced ores? Well, I do have some intel. It's just that my work here as an apprentice at Amenoma Smithy keeps me ever so occupied...
How about this, then? I'll mark these ore locations on your map. Bring them back to me, and I'll see what I can do about them.

Ah, are you asking about locations where you can find our locally-produced ores? Well, I do have some intel. It's just that my work here as an apprentice at Amenoma Smithy keeps me ever so occupied...
Speaking of which, my master gave me some Magical Crystal Ore lately. It's quite different from the usual materials I work with, and I'm not as familiar as I could be with it just yet.

Let's do it like this: I'll mark the locations of these Magical Crystal Ores on your map, and you can mine them and have a look. If you figure out a way to work with them, it would be great if you could tell me.
Hmm, come to think of it, I've heard that some people saw some ore resembling purplish crystals nearby.
That said, I'm just a businessperson, and I'm not in the mining business either. And it's not like I can leave my store so easily, anyway...
I'd say that they saw it around... here. There, it should be marked on your map now. If you think it'll be of any use to you, feel free to take a look.
